Subject: Re : [neat] ask about NEAT
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=235544548; y=zw3l_fiNmM7K_TLHFrp4ovJgZIwlmNcI3zr0c2Qkhwp7OR8SkA
X-Yahoo-Profile: marmakoide

Hi,

  NEAT optimize neural network. NEAT will generate many neural network=
, and you give a *fitness* to each neural network. Higher fitness means mor=
e interesting neural network.

 Thus, with NEAT, you can produce neural net=
works that can themselves can be used for doing classification. Your fitnes=
s for a given neural network should be its classification performance. To a=
void over-learning (a classifier which does not generalize), be careful to =
not use the same sample set to compute classification performance.

  Also,=
 be sure that more classic machine learning methods are not suitable, like =
SVM or back-prop, they are likely to be faster if they work good enough on =
your problem. Those methods are less general than NEAT but can exploit some=
 properties specific to supervised learning for speed gain.

Alex

--- En d=
